param.name: param.profile
param.spec: text description='Gentoo Profile' label='Profile' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'

param.name: param.release.type
param.spec: text description='Release Type' label='Type' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'

param.name: param.target
param.spec: text description='Target Medium' label='Target' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'

param.name: param.version
param.spec: text description='Version Stamp' label='Version' validationMode='not_empty' display='prompt'

parameters.param:
WORK_DIR="/var/data/catalyst/builds/%param.release.type%" SPEC_FILE="${WORK_DIR}/stage1.spec" BUILD_VER="%param.version%" SNAPSHOT="%param.snapshot%" SUB_ARCH="%param.subarch%" REL_TYPE="%param.release.type%" REL_PROFILE="%param.profile%" REL_SNAPSHOT="%param.snapshot%" SRC_PATH="%param.source.path%" TARGET="%param.target%" TEMPLATES="stage1.spec.header.template stage1.spec.use.template stage1.spec.pkg.template"
[[ -d ${WORK_DIR} ]] || mkdir -p ${WORK_DIR}
cd catalyst/templates echo "Checking for templates" for template in ${TEMPLATES[@]} do [[ -f $template ]] || exit 1 done
touch ${SPEC_FILE} || exit 1
echo "Mangling templates" sed -e "s/###SUB_ARCH###/${SUB_ARCH}/" -e "s/###VERSION###/${BUILD_VER}/" -e "s/###REL_TYPE###/${REL_TYPE}/" -e "s/###REL_PROFILE###/${REL_TYPE}\/linux\/${SUB_ARCH}/" -e "s/###REL_SNAPSHOT###/${SNAPSHOT}/" -e "s/###SRC_PATH###/${REL_TYPE}\/stage3-${SUB_ARCH}-${REL_TYPE}-${BUILD_VER}/" stage1.spec.header.template > ${SPEC_FILE} || exit 1 echo >> ${SPEC_FILE} || exit 1 cat stage1.spec.use.template >> ${SPEC_FILE} echo >> ${SPEC_FILE} || exit 1 cat stage1.spec.pkg.template >> ${SPEC_FILE}
cd /var/data/catalyst/builds/${REL_TYPE} [[ -f stage3-amd64-hardened-${BUILD_VER}.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc ]] && rm stage3-amd64-hardened-${BUILD_VER}.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc echo "Fetching hashes" wget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/releases/amd64/autobuilds/current-stage3-amd64-hardened/stage3-amd64-hardened-${BUILD_VER}.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc &> /dev/null || exit 1
if [[ -f stage3-amd64-hardened-${BUILD_VER}.tar.bz2 ]] && ( grep $(sha512sum stage3-amd64-hardened-${BUILD_VER}.tar.bz2|awk '{ print $1 }' ) stage3-amd64-hardened-${BUILD_VER}.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc &> /dev/null ) then echo "Not fetching, file exists and checksums match" FETCH_STAGE=0 elif [[ -f stage3-amd64-hardened-${BUILD_VER}.tar.bz2 ]] then echo "Checksum failed, you should investigate" && exit 1 else FETCH_STAGE=1 fi
cd /var/data/catalyst/snapshots/ rm portage-latest.tar.bz2.md5sum portage-latest.tar.bz2.gpgsig
echo "Fetching portage sums" wget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/snapshots/portage-latest.tar.bz2.md5sum &> /dev/null wget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/snapshots/portage-latest.tar.bz2.gpgsig &> /dev/null
if [[ -f portage-latest.tar.bz2 ]] && ( grep $(md5sum portage-latest.tar.bz2) portage-latest.tar.bz2.md5sum &> /dev/null ) then echo "Not fetching, file exists and checksums match" else FETCH_PORTAGE=1 [[ -f portage-latest.tar.bz2 ]] && echo "Clobbering stagnant snapshot" && rm portage-latest.tar.bz2 fi
(( FETCH_PORTAGE == 1 )) && lftp -c pget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/snapshots/portage-latest.tar.bz2 &> /dev/null
cd /var/data/catalyst/builds/${REL_TYPE}
(( FETCH_STAGE == 1 )) && echo "Fetching stage" && cd /var/data/catalyst/builds/${REL_TYPE} && ( lftp -c pget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/releases/amd64/autobuilds/current-stage3-amd64-hardened/stage3-amd64-hardened-${BUILD_VER}.tar.bz2 &> /dev/null )
(( FETCH_STAGE == 0 )) && echo "Not fetching stage" cd ${WORK_DIR}
echo "Taking portage snapshot" sudo /usr/bin/catalyst -s ${SNAPSHOT} echo "Running catalyst stage1" sudo /usr/bin/catalyst -f $(basename ${SPEC_FILE}) || exit 1 echo "Fin."

[[ -d /var/tmp/catalyst/builds/%Release% ]] || mkdir -p /var/tmp/catalyst/builds/%Release% cd /var/tmp/catalyst/builds/%Release% wget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/releases/amd64/autobuilds/current-stage3-amd64-hardened/stage3-amd64-hardened-20151210.tar.bz2 wget -O portage-latest.tar.bz2 http://distfiles.gentoo.org/snapshots/portage-latest.tar.bz2 wget https://gitweb.gentoo.org/proj/releng.git/tree/releases/weekly/specs/amd64/livecd-stage1.spec #sudo catalyst -s "$(date +%Y).$(date +%m).$(date +%d)"
